common.erc20-approve-10x-deposits: Approve 10x the amount of this deposit
common.erc20-approve-10x-detailed-description: By activating 10x approval we automatically add 10x the amount of this transaction as allowance for future ones, saving you money on gas fees and time.
common.mainnet-is-now-live-description: Tunnel, stake, and more on mainnet using the new network switch.
common.network-does-not-match: This network doesn't match the one selected in your wallet.
common.unexpected-error: An unexpected error has occurred. Please try again.
common.unsupported-chain-heading: You're not connected to a supported chain
common.wait-minutes: Wait up to {minutes} minutes (estimated wait time)

connect-wallets.btc-wallet-requirement: A Bitcoin wallet is only required if moving assets between Bitcoin and Hemi.
connect-wallets.connect-to-see-balance: Connect to a supported network to see your balance
connect-wallets.description: Connect your EVM and BTC wallets to transfer assets seamlessly. For the best experience, use wallets from both networks.
connect-wallets.how-to-create-unisat-wallet: How to create a Unisat wallet

unisat-is-the-only-supported-wallet.first-line: The UniSat Web Extension is the only supported BTC wallet.
unisat-is-the-only-supported-wallet.second-line: Do not use the UniSat mobile app.

bitcoin-kit.heading: Hemi Bitcoin Kit Demo
bitcoin-kit.sub-heading: Demonstration of building on Bitcoin with Hemi using the Bitcoin Kit

cryptochords.heading: Crypto Chords
cryptochords.sub-heading: An audio-visual depiction of transactions on the Hemi network

demos.heading: DEMOS
demos.sub-heading: Biometric verification solutions for Web3 applications.

demos.heading: Demos

hemihatchlings.heading: Hemi Hatchlings
hemihatchlings.sub-heading: Learn how Ethereum & Bitcoin finality works

purefinance.heading: Pure Finance
purefinance.sub-heading: Utility and smart contract interaction built directly into the Hemi network

demos.sub-heading: Learn and explore with Hemi developer demos

not-found.title: Oops! Page not found

get-started.add-networks-testnet: Add Ethereum Sepolia & Hemi testnet to your wallet.
get-started.heading: Get started on Hemi
get-started.here-are-some-options-mainnet: Here are some DEXs you might want to explore.
get-started.here-are-some-options-testnet: Here are some faucets you might want to explore.
get-started.learn-about-tunneling: Learn about tunneling assets to and from Hemi.

learn-more-tutorials.learn-about-capsules: Learn about gasless transactions, re-routing/recalling, and configurable security with Capsules on Hemi.
learn-more-tutorials.learn-about-multisig-wallet: Learn about multi-sig wallets and set up a Safe Wallet on Hemi.
learn-more-tutorials.learn-to-add-themi-wallet: Earning tHEMI rewards from PoP mining? Add the token contract address and view rewards.
learn-more-tutorials.learn-to-deploy-erc20: Learn how to deploy an ERC-20 token on Hemi using Hardhat.
learn-more-tutorials.learn-to-develop-hello-world: Learn how to develop and deploy a HelloWorld smart contract on Hemi using Remix IDE.
learn-more-tutorials.learn-to-get-bitcoin-balance: Deploy a small contract in Remix IDE with a single method which calls the Bitcoin Balance precompile and returns the balance.
learn-more-tutorials.learn-to-setup-btc-wallet: Learn how to set up and get started with a BTC (UniSat) wallet.
learn-more-tutorials.learn-to-setup-evm-wallet: Learn how to set up and get started with an EVM (MetaMask) wallet.
learn-more-tutorials.learn-to-tunnel-to-hemi: Learn how to tunnel (bridge) your ETH assets to and from Hemi.
learn-more-tutorials.set-up-cli-pop-miner: Set up and run your PoP miner, either by downloading pre-built binaries or by building from source.

get-started.learn-to-deploy-smart-contract: Beginner friendly! Learn how to deploy smart contracts.
get-started.subheading: One network, powered by Bitcoin & Ethereum.
get-started.tutorials-and-tools: Tutorials and tools to get you started quickly.
get-started.tutorials-subheading: Follow along with some of the tutorials to help you get a head start when building your first Hemi project.

navbar.agree-to-terms-and-policy: By using this application, you agree to the <terms>Terms of Use</terms> and <policy>Privacy Policy</policy>

dashboard.subtitle: Stake your assets to earn rewards and boost your points.
dashboard.title: Dashboard

drawer.description-manage-stake: Top up your stake, or withdraw anytime—you're in full control!
drawer.unstake-eth-as-weth-heading: Unstaked ETH will be received as WETH
drawer.unstake-eth-as-weth-subheading: When you stake ETH, it is automatically converted to WETH. Upon unstaking, you'll receive WETH, which you can unwrap back to ETH if desired.
drawer.you-can-unstake-anytime: You can unstake any time and keep the points already earned.

stake.learn-how-to-stake-on-hemi: Learn how to stake on Hemi
stake.title: Stake

token-custom-drawer.i-am-sure-to-tunnel: I'm sure I want to tunnel with this token.
token-custom-drawer.make-a-request-to-add: If you'd like to add this ERC-20 token pair to Hemi's approved tokens list, <link>make a request</link>.
token-custom-drawer.subheading: You need to input the pair of contract addresses from both Ethereum and Hemi to tunnel with this token.

token-selector.search-tokens: Search by token name or address...

form.hemi-receiving-address-description: Deposited {symbol} is sent to the address associated with your connected EVM wallet.

review-deposit.we-could-not-process-this-deposit: We couldn't process this deposit automatically

tunnel-partners.description: Once selected, you'll be redirected to complete your deposit. For assistance, contact the partner bridge directly.

tunnel-partners.use-at-your-own-risk: Use partner bridges at your own risk
